scripts.build: cd redstone-oracle-process && ao build && mkdir -p dist && mv process.wasm dist/
scripts.deploy: ao publish redstone-oracle-process/dist/process.wasm -w .secrets/wallet.json -t Memory-Limit -v 1-gb -t Compute-Limit -v 9000000000000 -t Module-Format -v wasm64-unknown-emscripten-draft_2024_02_15
scripts.pm2: pm2 start redstone-oracle-process/relayer.mjs --name redstone-relayer --cron-restart="*/15 * * * * *" -- --env prod/dist/process.wasm -w .secrets/wallet.json -t Memory-Limit -v 1-gb -t Compute-Limit -v 9000000000000 -t Module-Format -v wasm64-unknown-emscripten-draft_2024_02_15
scripts.loader-issue: cd test-process && ao build && node --experimental-wasm-memory64 process.helper.mjs
